participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and nurturing, always eager to share experiences and connect with others.
participant_1.background: Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling. I'm a bit of a klutz but I'm comfortable with who I am and I'll do everything I can to give my child a good future. I run a small bakery.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Passionate and ambitious, with a great love for music and family.
participant_2.background: I love to sing in my free time, it's my passion and I dream of making it big one day. I own many cars. I created the mobile that hangs above my baby's crib. I have kids, and we enjoy spending time together. I work as a bartender.

content.text: I'm well, thank you! I am a bit bloated today, but I'm sure it will pass. I love to bake and travel. What are your passions?
Oh no! I hope you feel better soon! I love to sing and spend time with my kids. I also work as a bartender.
That sounds really fun! I love to sing too! I don't have kids, but I do have a small bakery.
Oh that's so cool! What kind of bakery do you run?
I make all kinds of desserts, but my specialty is cupcakes.
That sounds delicious! I love cupcakes!
Thanks! I'm glad you like them! What's your favorite kind of cupcake?
I love vanilla cupcakes with chocolate frosting.
